title: “Car and driver” magazine slab
content:
Hi again,  
I thought It was “Salvo Serif” or “Dispatch”. But no, it isn’t. Any ideas what that might be? This slab serif from “Car and Driver” magazine?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317165702im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Car_and_Driver1_3597.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317165702im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Car_and_Driver3_3562.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317165702im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Car_and_Driver2_5664.jpg)

Font: 

 Prelo Slab (DSType)
